oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Felix Garner to Nellie Parham, 1918 November 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This letter from Felix Garner, Motor Truck Company 547, Motor Supply Train 428, American Expeditionary Forces, is to his sister, Nellie Parham, in Vernon, Tennessee. It is on YMCA letterhead and is a routine letter home, just as war was ending. The letter is accompanied by the original envelope.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
